title: Countries with the most affected people from earthquakes 1900 to 2016
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of affected people (in millions) for 10 number of Countrys.
The Number of affected people (in millions) is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Haiti.
The highest Country China has 67.5 more Number of affected people (in millions) than the lowest Country Haiti.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of affected people (in millions) in the y axis.
